io.spine.validate.option

Class NumberOptionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.validate.option.NumberOptionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StandardOptionFactory, ValidatingOptionFactory

    @AutoService(value=ValidatingOptionFactory.class)
 @Internal
 @Immutable
public final class NumberOptionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements StandardOptionFactory
    An implementation of ValidatingOptionFactory which adds validation options for numbers.

    Creates (max), (min), and (range) options for number fields.

      Obtains additional options for int64, sint64, uint64, fixed64, and sfixed64 fields validation.
      java.util.Set<FieldValidatingOption<?>> forLong()
      Obtains additional options for int32, sint32, uint32, fixed32, and sfixed32 fields validation.
